visR 0.1.1.9004

    • Survival Analysis with visR using CDISC ADaM standard
    • Survival Analysis with visR
  • Changelog

Display a summary Table (i.e. table one)

Source: R/tableone.R
tableone.Rd

Wrapper function to produce a summary table (i.e. Table One). Create and render a summary table for a dataset. A typical example of a summary table are "table one", the first table in an applied medical research manuscript.

Calculate summary statistics and present them in a formatted table

tableone(
  data,
  title,
  datasource,
  strata = NULL,
  overall = T,
  summary_function = summarize_tab1,
  ...
)

Arguments

data

The dataframe or tibble to visualize
title

Table title to include in the rendered table. Input is a text string.
datasource

String specifying the datasource underlying the data set
strata

Character vector with column names to use for stratification in the summary table. Default: NULL , which indicates no stratification.
overall

If TRUE, the summary statistics for the overall dataset are also calculated
summary_function

A function defining summary statistics for numeric and categorical values Pre-implemented functions are summarize and summarize_tab1
...

Pass options to render_table
footnote

Table footnote to include in the rendered table. Input is a text string.

Examples


library(dplyr)
library(visR)


# metadata for table
t1_title <- "My table one title"
t1_ds <- "My table one data source"
t1_fn <- "My table one footnote"


## table by treatment - without overall and render with DT 
adtte %>%
   dplyr::filter(SAFFL == "Y") %>%
   dplyr::select(AGE, AGEGR1, SEX, EVNTDESC, TRTA) %>%
   visR::tableone(
      strata = "TRTA",
      overall = F,
      title = t1_title,
      datasource = t1_ds,
      footnote = t1_fn,
      engine = "DT"
   )

## table by treatment - without overall and render with GT 
adtte %>%
   dplyr::filter(SAFFL == "Y") %>%
   dplyr::select(AGE, AGEGR1, SEX, EVNTDESC, TRTA) %>%
   visR::tableone(
      strata = "TRTA",
      overall = F,
      title = t1_title,
      datasource = t1_ds,
      footnote = t1_fn,
      engine = "gt"
   )

## table by treatment - without overall and render with kable
adtte %>%
   dplyr::filter(SAFFL == "Y") %>%
   dplyr::select(AGE, AGEGR1, SEX, EVNTDESC, TRTA) %>%
   visR::tableone(
      strata = "TRTA",
      overall = F,
      title = t1_title,
      datasource = t1_ds,
      footnote = t1_fn,
      engine = "kable"
   )

#> <table style="NAborder-bottom: 0;border-bottom: 0;">
#> <caption>My table one title</caption>
#>  <thead>
#>   <tr>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> variable </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> statistic </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> Placebo (N=86) </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> Xanomeline High Dose (N=84) </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> Xanomeline Low Dose (N=84) </th>
#>   </tr>
#>  </thead>
#> <tbody>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> AGE </td>

#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 75.2 (8.59) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 74.4 (7.89) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 75.7 (8.29) </td>
#>   </tr>

#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> SEX </td>

#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 33 (38.4%) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 44 (52.4%) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 34 (40.5%) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> EVNTDESC </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Dematologic Event Occured </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 29 (33.7%) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 61 (72.6%) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 62 (73.8%) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> EVNTDESC </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Study Completion Date </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 57 (66.3%) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 23 (27.4%) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 22 (26.2%) </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> <tfoot>
#> <tr><td style="padding: 0; " colspan="100%"><span style="font-style: italic;">Additional Note:</span></td></tr>
#> <tr><td style="padding: 0; " colspan="100%">
#> <sup></sup> My table one footnote</td></tr>
#> </tfoot>
#> <tfoot>
#> <tr><td style="padding: 0; " colspan="100%"><span style="font-style: italic;">Data Source:</span></td></tr>
#> <tr><td style="padding: 0; " colspan="100%">
#> <sup></sup> My table one data source</td></tr>
#> </tfoot>
#> </table>

## table by treatment - without overall and render with kable as 
## a latex table format rather than html 
adtte %>%
   dplyr::filter(SAFFL == "Y") %>%
   dplyr::select(AGE, AGEGR1, SEX, EVNTDESC, TRTA) %>%
   visR::tableone(
      strata = "TRTA",
      overall = F,
      title = t1_title,
      datasource = t1_ds,
      footnote = t1_fn,
      output_format = "latex",
      engine = "kable"
   )

#> \begin{table}
#> 
#> \caption{My table one title}
#> \centering

#>  & Mean (SD) & 75.2 (8.59) & 74.4 (7.89) & 75.7 (8.29)\\

#>  & Median (IQR) & 76 (69.2-81.8) & 76 (70.8-80) & 77.5 (71-82)\\
#> \cmidrule{2-5}
#>  & Min-max & 52-89 & 56-88 & 51-88\\
#> \cmidrule{2-5}
#> \multirow[t]{-4}{*}{\raggedright\arraybackslash AGE} & Missing & 0 (0\%) & 0 (0\%) & 0 (0\%)\\

#>  & <65 & 14 (16.3\%) & 11 (13.1\%) & 8 (9.52\%)\\

#>  & F & 53 (61.6\%) & 40 (47.6\%) & 50 (59.5\%)\\
